metadata.reset:
Press “RESET” in the Factory Default Reset dialog. This will reset
the Z- Wave chip, and the gateway will show “DEVICE RESET
LOCALLY NOTIFICATION” after the restart.
If this controller is the primary controller for your network,
resetting it will result in the nodes in your network becoming
orphaned, and it will be necessary after the reset to exclude and
re-include all of the nodes in the network. If this controller is being
used as a secondary controller in the network, use this procedure
to reset this controller only in the event that the network primary
controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
